author: Nadia PR, Rahmad Nasution
title: Indonesia expands military arsenal with locally built Harimau tanks
description: Indonesia is expanding its military arsenal by adding locally produced Harimau tanks to strengthen national defense, the country's top military commander ...
content: Jakarta (ANTARA) - Indonesia is expanding its military arsenal by adding locally produced Harimau tanks to strengthen national defense, the country's top military commander said on Sunday.Armed Force… [+2074 chars]
